item.title: Weekly Fly tipping, 23rd June
item.description:
Constant fly tipping by the residents of the flats above the row of shops. Happens every single week without fail. Do these residents not get provided bins?? Large amount of rubbish - gets ripped open by foxes. Also smells really bad due to heat. Looks disgusting and dirty. This needs to be sorted out by Bexley Council as it’s clearly ignored when we constantly report this as an issue every week.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ellenborough Road, North Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The bus stop on Belmont Parade is missing the 61 timretable, 23rd June
item.description:
The bus stop at Belmont Parade has been missing a timetable for the 61 bus for several months. Can you please put one in for those who can’t use apps? Neither does this bus stop have electronic signage. Could this please be added?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Green Lane, Chislehurst, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Water draining from Turkish bath onto pavement, 23rd June
item.description:
Observed (for over 20mins) water being drained from sauna/turkish bath in Block (Tram Depot) onto pavement. Cleaner/maintenance man confirmed the source. Also, Tram Depot wall clearly being damaged by damp.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Casimir Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whitworth Street is full of small potholes, 23rd June
item.description:
I've previously reported a big pothole to the Council and it was finally fixed! However, the whole of Whitworth Street is full of small potholes, all along the length road. Since the previous one was fixed in 10-15 minutes by experienced workers, I don't think it's a stretch to improve the whole road in one go. I've attached screenshots with some relevant potholes, but there's many more than that.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 35, Whitworth Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sauna/turkish bath outlet draining onto pavement, 23rd June
item.description:
Observed water being drained from Block (in Tram Depot) Turkish bath directly onto pavement. This continued for at least 25 mins as I took photos and a video over time. The cleaner/maintenance guy confirmed the source. The wall is also clearly damp.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Casimir Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Subsidence/pothole os 80 -82 Walton Road, 23rd June
item.description:
There is a large pot hole subsidence as has become dramatically worse over the last 2 weeks. You can put your fingers down the the hole and is very dangerous. Please can this be looked into with a matter of urgency
